column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Overrated.  I'm not the biggest fan of pancake to start off (exception: Bongo Room's red velvet)but wanted to to see if Wildberry can convert me.  First off
column2: the wait was only 30 minutes on a Sunday at brunch hour so it wasn't too bad.  The servers are extremely efficient in doing what they do to clear the tables so kudos to them.  Now
column3: as far as the food goes
column5: but that really doesn't cut it for me.
